name: Kid the Cat
description:
Kid the Cat is an experimental, kinda weird, game that takes you on an exploratory journey with your cat. Travel through mazes and forests, experience weird and hellish situations, and discover what the future has prepared for you at the end of your journey.

This is another game for my "One Game a Week" project and I will probably expand it in the future as time didn't let me do what I was trying to with this.

Features:

  • Have and adventure with your cat.
  • Make new friends.
  • Meet the Hover Cat.
  • Make your own conclusions.

Be sure to follow me on twitter @OPC_Eadow to know when more games come out. twitter.com/OPC_Eadow
